snippet: Several analysts expect Target Corp to slash its share buybacks as the third-largest U.S. retailer copes with costs tied to the massive data breach that affected millions of customers....

headline.print_headline: Data Breach Costs Seen Crimping Target's Firepower for Buybacks
headline.main: Data Breach Costs Seen Crimping Target's Firepower for Buybacks

lead_paragraph: Several analysts expect Target Corp to slash its share buybacks as the third-largest U.S. retailer copes with costs tied to the massive data breach that affected millions of customers.
